description:
Use this to set keyboard shortcuts for the [field.text-annotation](field.text-annotation.md) component.

[View example in the sandbox](https://ya.cc/t/qBDHxAiu3twgqE)
properties.labels.description: Keyboard shortcuts for selecting categories. They're assigned to buttons with categories in the order they're shown.
properties.remove.description: Use this property to allow a Toloker to deselect an entire line or part of it. The key that you assign to this property will deselect.
